Abilities.Name: Ride (Broodmate)
Abilities.Ability: Whenever you move Broodmate Brak, you can move Uza adjacent (this does not count as an action for uza)

Abilities.Name: Brak (Broodmate)
Abilities.Ability: When you take a turn with Broodmate Brak, you may also take a turn with Broodmate Uza. (Both units are exhausted)
